embedding_coe_ennreal:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nnreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `ennreal -/
theorem embedding_coe_ennreal : Embedding (coe : ennreal → EReal) :=
  ⟨⟨by
      refine' le_antisymm _ _
      · rw [@order_topology.topology_eq_generate_intervals EReal _, ← coinduced_le_iff_le_induced]
        refine' le_generateFrom fun s ha => _
        rcases ha with ⟨a, rfl | rfl⟩
        show IsOpen { b : ennreal | a < ↑b }
        · induction' a using EReal.rec with x
          · simp only [isOpen_univ, bot_lt_coe_ennreal, set_of_true]
          · rcases le_or_lt 0 x with (h | h)
            · have : (x : EReal) = ((id ⟨x, h⟩ : nnreal) : ennreal) := rfl
              rw [this]
              simp only [id.def, coe_ennreal_lt_coe_ennreal_iff]
              exact isOpen_Ioi
            · have : ∀ y : ennreal, (x : EReal) < y := fun y =>
                (EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff.2 h).trans_le (coe_ennreal_nonneg _)
              simp only [this, isOpen_univ, set_of_true]
          · simp only [set_of_false, isOpen_empty, not_top_lt]
        show IsOpen { b : ennreal | ↑b < a }
        · induction' a using EReal.rec with x
          · simp only [not_lt_bot, set_of_false, isOpen_empty]
          · rcases le_or_lt 0 x with (h | h)
            · have : (x : EReal) = ((id ⟨x, h⟩ : nnreal) : ennreal) := rfl
              rw [this]
              simp only [id.def, coe_ennreal_lt_coe_ennreal_iff]
              exact isOpen_Iio
            · convert isOpen_empty
              apply eq_empty_iff_forall_not_mem.2 fun y hy => lt_irrefl (x : EReal) _
              exact ((EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff.2 h).trans_le (coe_ennreal_nonneg y)).trans hy
          · simp only [← coe_ennreal_top, coe_ennreal_lt_coe_ennreal_iff]
            exact isOpen_Iio
      · rw [@order_topology.topology_eq_generate_intervals (ennreal) _]
        refine' le_generateFrom fun s ha => _
        rcases ha with ⟨a, rfl | rfl⟩
        exact ⟨Ioi a, isOpen_Ioi, by simp [Ioi]⟩
        exact ⟨Iio a, isOpen_Iio, by simp [Iio]⟩⟩, fun a b => by simp only [imp_self, coe_ennreal_eq_coe_ennreal_iff]⟩
#align embedding_coe_ennreal embedding_coe_ennreal
embedding_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/-
Copyright (c) 2021 Sébastien Gouëzel. All rights reserved.
Released under Apache 2.0 license as described in the file LICENSE.
Authors: Sébastien Gouëzel
-/
theorem embedding_coe : Embedding (coe : exprℝ → EReal) :=
  ⟨⟨by
      refine' le_antisymm _ _
      · rw [@order_topology.topology_eq_generate_intervals EReal _, ← coinduced_le_iff_le_induced]
        refine' le_generateFrom fun s ha => _
        rcases ha with ⟨a, rfl | rfl⟩
        show IsOpen { b : exprℝ | a < ↑b }
        · induction a using EReal.rec
          · simp only [isOpen_univ, bot_lt_coe, set_of_true]
          · simp only [EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff]
            exact isOpen_Ioi
          · simp only [set_of_false, isOpen_empty, not_top_lt]
        show IsOpen { b : exprℝ | ↑b < a }
        · induction a using EReal.rec
          · simp only [not_lt_bot, set_of_false, isOpen_empty]
          · simp only [EReal.coe_lt_coe_iff]
            exact isOpen_Iio
          · simp only [isOpen_univ, coe_lt_top, set_of_true]
      · rw [@order_topology.topology_eq_generate_intervals (exprℝ) _]
        refine' le_generateFrom fun s ha => _
        rcases ha with ⟨a, rfl | rfl⟩
        exact ⟨Ioi a, isOpen_Ioi, by simp [Ioi]⟩
        exact ⟨Iio a, isOpen_Iio, by simp [Iio]⟩⟩, fun a b => by simp only [imp_self, EReal.coe_eq_coe_iff]⟩
#align embedding_coe embedding_coe
continuous_on_to_real:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr ᶜ» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem continuous_on_to_real : ContinuousOn EReal.toReal («expr ᶜ» {«expr⊥», «expr⊤»} : Set EReal) := fun a ha =>
  ContinuousAt.continuousWithinAt
    (tendsto_toReal
      (by
        simp [not_or] at ha
        exact ha.2)
      (by
        simp [not_or] at ha
        exact ha.1))
#align continuous_on_to_real continuous_on_to_real
continuous_neg:
theorem continuous_neg : Continuous fun x : EReal => -x :=
  negHomeo.continuous
#align continuous_neg continuous_neg

  embedding_coe.continuous
#align continuous_coe_real_ereal continuous_coe_real_ereal

theorem continuous_coe_iff {f : α → exprℝ} : (Continuous fun a => (f a : EReal)) ↔ Continuous f :=
  embedding_coe.continuous_iff.symm
#align continuous_coe_iff continuous_coe_iff

continuous_at_add_top_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_top_top : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) («expr⊤», «expr⊤») :=
  by
  simp only [ContinuousAt, tendsto_nhds_top_iff_real, top_add_top, nhds_prod_eq]
  intro r
  rw [eventually_prod_iff]
  refine'
    ⟨fun z => (r : EReal) < z, Ioi_mem_nhds (coe_lt_top _), fun z => ((0 : exprℝ) : EReal) < z,
      Ioi_mem_nhds (by simp [zero_lt_one]), fun x hx y hy => _⟩
  dsimp
  convert add_lt_add hx hy
  simp
#align continuous_at_add_top_top continuous_at_add_top_top
continuous_at_add_top_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_top_coe (a : exprℝ) : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) («expr⊤», a) :=
  by
  simp only [ContinuousAt, tendsto_nhds_top_iff_real, top_add_coe, nhds_prod_eq]
  intro r
  rw [eventually_prod_iff]
  refine'
    ⟨fun z => ((r - (a - 1) : exprℝ) : EReal) < z, Ioi_mem_nhds (coe_lt_top _), fun z => ((a - 1 : exprℝ) : EReal) < z,
      Ioi_mem_nhds (by simp [-EReal.coe_sub]), fun x hx y hy => _⟩
  dsimp
  convert add_lt_add hx hy
  simp
#align continuous_at_add_top_coe continuous_at_add_top_coe
continuous_at_add_coe_top:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_coe_top (a : exprℝ) : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) (a, «expr⊤») :=
  by
  change ContinuousAt ((fun p : EReal × EReal => p.2 + p.1) ∘ Prod.swap) (a, «expr⊤»)
  apply ContinuousAt.comp _ continuous_swap.continuous_at
  simp_rw [add_comm]
  exact continuous_at_add_top_coe a
#align continuous_at_add_coe_top continuous_at_add_coe_top
continuous_at_add_coe_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
theorem continuous_at_add_coe_coe (a b : exprℝ) : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) (a, b) := by
  simp only [ContinuousAt, nhds_coe_coe, ← coe_add, tendsto_map'_iff, (· ∘ ·), tendsto_coe, tendsto_add]
#align continuous_at_add_coe_coe continuous_at_add_coe_coe
continuous_at_add_coe_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_coe_bot (a : exprℝ) : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) (a, «expr⊥») :=
  by
  change ContinuousAt ((fun p : EReal × EReal => p.2 + p.1) ∘ Prod.swap) (a, «expr⊥»)
  apply ContinuousAt.comp _ continuous_swap.continuous_at
  simp_rw [add_comm]
  exact continuous_at_add_bot_coe a
#align continuous_at_add_coe_bot continuous_at_add_coe_bot
continuous_at_add_bot_coe:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_bot_coe (a : exprℝ) : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) («expr⊥», a) :=
  by
  simp only [ContinuousAt, tendsto_nhds_bot_iff_real, nhds_prod_eq, bot_add]
  intro r
  rw [eventually_prod_iff]
  refine'
    ⟨fun z => z < ((r - (a + 1) : exprℝ) : EReal), Iio_mem_nhds (bot_lt_coe _), fun z => z < ((a + 1 : exprℝ) : EReal),
      Iio_mem_nhds (by simp [-coe_add, zero_lt_one]), fun x hx y hy => _⟩
  convert add_lt_add hx hy
  rw [sub_add_cancel]
#align continuous_at_add_bot_coe continuous_at_add_bot_coe
continuous_at_add_bot_bot:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
theorem continuous_at_add_bot_bot : ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) («expr⊥», «expr⊥») :=
  by
  simp only [ContinuousAt, tendsto_nhds_bot_iff_real, nhds_prod_eq, bot_add]
  intro r
  rw [eventually_prod_iff]
  refine' ⟨fun z => z < r, Iio_mem_nhds (bot_lt_coe _), fun z => z < 0, Iio_mem_nhds (bot_lt_coe _), fun x hx y hy => _⟩
  dsimp
  convert add_lt_add hx hy
  simp
#align continuous_at_add_bot_bot continuous_at_add_bot_bot
continuous_at_add:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊥» -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr⊤» -/
/-- The addition on `ereal` is continuous except where it doesn't make sense (i.e., at `(⊥, ⊤)`
and at `(⊤, ⊥)`). -/
theorem continuous_at_add {p : EReal × EReal} (h : p.1 ≠ «expr⊤» ∨ p.2 ≠ «expr⊥») (h' : p.1 ≠ «expr⊥» ∨ p.2 ≠ «expr⊤») :
    ContinuousAt (fun p : EReal × EReal => p.1 + p.2) p :=
  by
  rcases p with ⟨x, y⟩
  induction x using EReal.rec <;> induction y using EReal.rec
  · exact continuous_at_add_bot_bot
  · exact continuous_at_add_bot_coe _
  · simpa using h'
  · exact continuous_at_add_coe_bot _
  · exact continuous_at_add_coe_coe _ _
  · exact continuous_at_add_coe_top _
  · simpa using h
  · exact continuous_at_add_top_coe _
  · exact continuous_at_add_top_top
#align continuous_at_add continuous_at_add
